flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: As you walk up to the toilet seat in the down position . You stand in fron of it , as you lift the seat up the motion sensor will trigger the mister to coat the seat with sanatizer . This will give you a germ free experience .
guide.title: Toilet seat with sanatizer mister with motion activation
